name: cosmic-guardians-nft
description: Full-stack NFT minting platform with lazy minting and multi-currency payments

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd contracts && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd contracts && npx hardhat compile && cd ../backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd contracts && npx hardhat test && cd ../backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.clean: rm -rf contracts/artifacts contracts/cache backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
